Author: TurnTechAstraeus
Text: He is, yeah that's how I looked at it, I've spent today either napping or rearranging MtG cards in a bid to get out of eating. Part of me is wondering why he's worrying though cause I've put weight on. Like 20lbs in the past 4 months??

Author: LFB_
Text: Sounds like this is a good friend.   I do the same, because I do eat something most days even if it's not much at all. I almost passed out at work recently and my colleague asked if I'd eaten today; when I said "yes" what I meant was "yes but only one of those tiny biscuits someone was passing round and I actually didn't eat anything at all for 3 days before and I'm not eating again til tomorrow evening." It's not technically lying... right?!
